entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story. He is mentioned as someone who is being avoided by others.

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is Uncle Vernon's son and Harry's cousin. He is described as standing with his mouth slightly ajar.

relationships.description: Harry is compared to the giant Grawp, and it is mentioned that Dudley reminds Harry of him. This suggests a physical similarity between them.
